channel.title: Community-Rps
channel.description:
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/27zdm6v.jpg[/img]
Our Forums: www.community-rsps.com
Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video..
[size=18pt]Free for all events[/size] Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.
[size=18pt]Ingame Highscores[/size] for those people that like to train to become the best. Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah... But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.
[size=18pt]TriviaBot[/size] Example: First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp
[size=18pt]Clue Scrolls[/size] To much to write There is a guide on this on the forums Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates
[size=18pt]Quests[/size] Uidbanning .motherboard banning(they cant login if they change ip after uuid ban)
.Currently have 2 quests Rewards? .Ardy cloak 1 .10million gp .Crystal key Npc kill shop where regular players can buy a yell right
[size=18pt]Castle Wars[/size] .Basic castle wars like Runescape .Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets
[size=18pt]Custom Construction[/size] .Can train it everywhere .Dosent bother others because only you can see it .Got a good idea on how to make it better, post on forums [/center]
[size=18pt]Media[/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OfMsM4_vXp8[/youtube] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0rosl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/11hz6zm.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qu15io.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2egfa4h.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/bfq136.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/ohiw02.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zgx8qw.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dkmm9c.png[/img]

item.title: Community-Rps
item.dc:creator: @PK_Syndicate PK Syndicate
item.description:
@PK_Syndicate wrote:

allunited:

im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server

[quote=“allunited, post:1, topic:525621”]Example:
First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp[/quote]

If I am honest those two statements were contradictory.

Read full topic

item.title: Community-Rps
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

27zdm6v.jpg722×124

Our Forums: www.community-rsps.com

Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video…

[size=18pt]Free for all events[/size]
Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.

[size=18pt]Ingame Highscores[/size]
for those people that like to train to become the best.
Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah…
But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.

[size=18pt]TriviaBot[/size]
Example:
First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp

[size=18pt]Clue Scrolls[/size]
To much to write
There is a guide on this on the forums
Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates

[size=18pt]Quests[/size]
Uidbanning
.motherboard banning(they cant login if they change ip after uuid ban)

.Currently have 2 quests
Rewards?
.Ardy cloak 1
.10million gp
.Crystal key
Npc kill shop where regular players can buy a yell right

[size=18pt]Castle Wars[/size]
.Basic castle wars like Runescape
.Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets

[size=18pt]Custom Construction[/size]
.Can train it everywhere
.Dosent bother others because only you can see it
.Got a good idea on how to make it better, post on forums
[/center]
